titles.title: A bill to provide States with the option of applying for and receiving temporary waivers for the States to experiment with new approaches that integrate Federal programs in order to provide more coordinated and holistic solutions to families in need, and for other purposes.
Economic Mobility, Prosperity, and Opportunity with Waivers that Enable Reforms for States Act of 2019

EMPOWERS Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
